title: Mapping Misconduct: NYPD Complaint Trends (1985–2019)
description: Interactive visualization of NYC civilian complaints (1985–2019) using D3.js, exploring spatial and temporal patterns of police misconduct.

title: Complaints Surge Among Young Officers
description: Two contrasting visualizations built from the same NYPD complaint data to demonstrate how design and framing can shape interpretation and narrative.

title: Portfolio
description: A growing data science portfolio showcasing analytical, visualization, and research projects developed during graduate study and beyond.

title: NYC Yellow Taxi Fare Prediction
description: Large-scale predictive modeling project using Apache Spark and LightGBM to estimate taxi fares from 150M+ NYC ride records.

title: Quarterback Salary Analysis
description: Exploratory analysis of NFL quarterback salaries and team performance, using clustering and visual analytics to examine how pay levels relate to win percentage.

title: Car Value Predictor
description: Machine learning model and dashboard that estimates car prices from user inputs, built end-to-end from web-scraped vehicle listings.
